@graph.title: Advances in materials science for environmental and energy technologies IV
abstract: "The Materials Science and Technology 2014 Conference and Exhibition (MS & T'14) was held October 12-16, 2014 at the David L. Lawrence Convention Center, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. One of the major themes of the conference was Environmental and Energy Issues. Twenty papers from five symposia are included in this volume. These symposia included Materials Issues in Nuclear Waste Management in the 21st Century; Green Technologies for Materials Manufacturing and Processing VI; Nanotechnology for Energy, Healthcare and Industry; Materials and Processes for CO2 Capture, Conversion, and Sequestration; and Materials Development for Nuclear Applications and Extreme Environments."--Preface

Materials Issues in Nuclear Waste Management. Uptake of Uranium by Tungstic Acid / Hamed Albusaidi, Cory K Perkins, Allen W Apblett -- Electrical Conductivity Method for Monitoring Accumulation of Crystals / M K Edwards, J Matyáš, J V Crum, C C Bonham, M J Schweiger -- Crystallization in High Level Waste (HLW) Glass Melters: Savannah River Site Operational Experience / Kevin M Fox, David K Peeler, Albert A Kruger -- Scoping Melting Studies of High Alumina Waste Glass Compositions / Jared O Kroll, Michael J Schweiger, John D Vienna -- Research-Scale Melter: An Experimental Platform for Evaluating Crystal Accumulation in High-Level Waste Glasses / J Matyáš, G J Sevigny, M J Schweiger, A A Kruger -- Characterization of High Level Nuclear Waste Glass Samples Following Extended Melter Idling / David K Peeler, Kevin M Fox, Albert A Kruger -- Synthesis of Mineral Matrices Based on Enriched Zirconium Pyrochlore for Immobilization of Actinide-Containing Waste / K Podbolotov, T Barinova -- Corrosion Evaluation of Melter Materials for Radioactive Waste Vitrification / Marissa M Reigel, Ken J Imrich, Carol M Jantzen -- Green Technologies for Materials Manufacturing and Processing. Green Flame Retardant Based on a Ceramic Precursor / Bhawani Regmi, Allen W Apblett -- Single-Source Precursor Approach to Barium Dimolybdate / Ahmed Moneeb, Allen W Apblett, Abdullah Al-Abdulrahman, Abdulaziz Bagabas -- Effects on Biomass Char Addition on Combustion Process of Pulverized Coal / LIU Yi-ran, LV Yingli, LI Bingchang -- A Comparative Analysis for Charpy Impact Energy in Polyester Composites Reinforced with Malva, Ramie and Curaua Fibers / Frederico Muylaert Margem, André Raeli Gomes, Luiz Gustavo Xavier Borges, Sergio Neves Monteiro -- Research on Simultaneous Injection of Waste Tires with Pulverized Coal for Blast Furnace / Bingji Yan, Jianliang Zhang, Hongwei Guo, Feng Liu -- Research on Using Blast Furnace Slag to Produce Building Stone / Bingji Yan, Jianliang Zhang, Hongwei Guo, Zhiwen Shi, Feng Liu -- A Green Leaching Method of Decomposing Synthetic CaWO4 by HO-H3PO4 in Tungsten Producing Process / Liang Liu, Jilai Xue -- Nanotechnology for Energy, Healthcare and Industry. Synthesis of Coated NANO Calcium Carbonate Particles and Their Characterization / S E Benjamin, Farah Mustafa -- Synthesis of TiO2 Nanostructures VIA Hydrothermal Method / Nursev Bilgin, Lutfi Agartan, Jongee Park, Abdullah Ozturk -- Carbon Nanotube-Based Impedimetric Biosensors for Bone Marker Detection / Mitali Patil, Madhumati Ramanathan, Vesselin Shanov, Prashant N Kumta -- Materials and Processes for CO2 Capture, Conversion, and Sequestration. High CO2 Permeation Flux Enabled by AL2O3 Modifier and In-Situ Infiltration of Molten Carbonate Into Gd-Doped CEO2 as a CO2 Separation Membrane / Jingjing Tong, Zachary Bills, Lingling Zhang, Jie Fang, Minfang Han, Kevin Huang -- Materials Development for Nuclear Applications and Extreme Environments. Superplasticity in Ceramics at High Temperature / Michael Opoku, Raghunath Kanakala, Indrajit Charit
